member.name: T:Program.ODataSource
member.summary: Provides the types to access an OData service
member.param: The Uri for the OData service
The local .csdl file for the service schema
Require that a direct connection to the service be available at design-time and force the refresh of the local schema file (default: true)
The folder used to resolve relative file paths at compile-time (default: folder containing the project or script)
Generate collections derived from DataServiceCollection (default: false)
